channel.title: No-Ip
channel.description:
If Anyone knows how to configure this part of the router.. so that my no-ip host would work i would be very thankful.. i've set up my no-ip acount thats all working fine.. my PvPScape.no-ip.info works within my own network such as my desktop pc.. my mum's pc and my laptop.. all under the same router.. but i would like to extend my network to other people :) if u know what i mean.. Please help..
[img]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/3950/portforwarding2me.jpg[/img]
~Thanks Matt~

item.title: No-Ip
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

I would honestly just suggest to go to Mod Taharoks tut. But if not then, you must go into your “Network Connections” from control panel and right click on the one you are connected to and select “Properties”. Then highlight “internet protocol” and select “properties”. Make sure you have a static IP and everything there is set. NOW, go back to the box where it says: “wireless network connection properties” and click the “advanced tab”. Now Click “settings” , a windows firewall box will come up, in this box, click the “advanced tab”. For all the connections you have, click on one and then click settings and fill everything out, and make sure that by the port name, there is a “check mark” to make sure that the port is enabled. Now it should work just fine.

BYE!!

Read full topic
